RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: SELECT Port.Name AS 'Port Name', GeneratorPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Tx Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Rx Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorFrameCount AS 'Generator Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorSigFrameCount AS 'Generator Sig Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.SigFrameCount AS 'Rx Sig Count (Frames)', (GeneratorPortResults.TotalOctetCount * 8) AS 'Total Tx Count (bits)', (AnalyzerPortResults.TotalOctetCount * 8) AS 'Total Rx Count (bits)', GeneratorPortResults.L1BitCount AS 'Tx L1 Count (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.L1BitCount AS 'Rx L1 Count (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.MinFrameLength AS 'Rx Min FrameLength', AnalyzerPortResults.MaxFrameLength AS 'Rx Max FrameLength', GeneratorPortResults.TotalCellCount AS 'Total Tx Count (Cells)', AnalyzerPortResults.TotalCellCount AS 'Total Rx Count (Cells)' FROM Port, GeneratorPortResults, Generator, AnalyzerPortResults, Analyzer WHERE ( Generator.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND GeneratorPortResults.ParentHnd = Generator.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND GeneratorPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Generator.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId )

RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: SELECT Port.Name AS 'Port Name', GeneratorPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Tx Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.TotalFrameCount AS 'Total Rx Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.FcsErrorFrameCount AS 'Rx FCS Error Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorCrcErrorFrameCount AS 'Generator CRC Error Count (Frames)', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorL3ChecksumErrorCount AS 'Generator L3 Checksum Error Count', GeneratorPortResults.GeneratorL4ChecksumErrorCount AS 'Generator L4 Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.Ipv4ChecksumErrorCount AS 'Rx IPv4 Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.TcpChecksumErrorCount AS 'Rx TCP Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.UdpChecksumErrorCount AS 'Rx UDP Checksum Error Count', AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsFillOctetCount AS 'Rx PRBS Fill Octet Count', AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsBitErrorCount AS 'Rx PRBS Bit Error Count', coalesce(round(cast(AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsBitErrorCount as double)/cast((AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsFillOctetCount * 8) as double), 3), 0.0) as 'PRBS Bit Error Ratio', AnalyzerPortResults.PrbsErrorFrameCount AS 'Rx PRBS Error Frame Count' FROM Port, GeneratorPortResults, Generator, AnalyzerPortResults, Analyzer WHERE ( Generator.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND GeneratorPortResults.ParentHnd = Generator.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND GeneratorPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Generator.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId )

RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.SqlString: SELECT Port.Name AS 'Port Name', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecSymbols AS 'Corrected RS FEC Bits (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreRsFecSerRate AS 'Pre RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostRsFecSerRate AS 'Post RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Pre Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Post Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)' FROM Port, AnalyzerPortResults, Analyzer WHERE ( Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId ) UNION SELECT ExternalDevicePort.Name AS 'Port Name', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedRsFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected RS FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedRsFecSymbols AS 'Corrected RS FEC Bits (bits)', AnalyzerPortResults.CorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Corrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.UncorrectedBaseRFecErrorCount AS 'Uncorrected BaseR FEC Errors Count (Frames)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreRsFecSerRate AS 'Pre RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostRsFecSerRate AS 'Post RS FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PreBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Pre Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)', AnalyzerPortResults.PostBaseRFecSerRate AS 'Post Base-R FEC Error Rate (fps)' FROM ExternalDevicePort, AnalyzerPortResults, Port, Analyzer WHERE ( Analyzer.ParentHnd = Port.Handle AND AnalyzerPortResults.ParentHnd = Analyzer.Handle AND ExternalDevicePort.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND AnalyzerPortResults.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Port.DataSetId = @DataSetId AND Analyzer.DataSetId = @DataSetId )
RealTimeResultGroupDefinition.Name: RealTimeResultGroupDefinition 10

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Agent Deployment Events", "explanation": "", "report_group": "GROUP_1"}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["ID", "MachineSetName", "MachineSetHnd", "Time", "NormalizedTime", "Event"]}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT ID, MachineSetName, MachineSetHnd, Time, ROUND(Time - (SELECT Time FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_events WHERE ID=1), 2) AS NormalizedTime, Event FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_events"}]}, {"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Agent Deployment Timing", "explanation": "", "report_group": "GROUP_1"}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["ID", "MachineSetName", "MachineSetHnd", "Time", "NormalizedTime", "Time"]}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT ID, MachineSetName, MachineSetHnd, Time, ROUND(Time - (SELECT Time FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_timing WHERE ID=1), 2) AS NormalizedTime, Count FROM CS_MachineSetDeploy_timing"}]}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Report Deployment Results

spirent.methodology.RunPyScriptCommand.Name: Get Deployed Agents

SequencerComment.Name: Comment

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN ((CASE WHEN Cpu.EnableCpuTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Mem.EnableMemTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Net.EnableNetTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Stor.EnableStorTestCriteria='True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_CpuTestCriteria AS Cpu, CS_MemTestCriteria AS Mem, CS_NetTestCriteria AS Net, CS_StorTestCriteria AS Stor"}]}, "sql_operations": []}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Load Enable And Test Criteria Flags

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Invalid Input", "explanation": "Input enable load flags are not correct.", "report_group": "SUMMARY", "report_verdict": {"apply_test_verdict": true, "failed_verdict_explanation": "Test criteria must be enabled on at least one dimension.", "passed_verdict_explanation": "Should never get here.", "sql_for_verdict": [{"static": "SELECT 0"}], "db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Cpu.EnableCpuTestCriteria AS 'Enable CPU Test Criteria', Mem.EnableMemTestCriteria AS 'Enable Memory Test Criteria', Net.EnableNetTestCriteria AS 'Enable Network Test Criteria', Stor.EnableStorTestCriteria AS 'Enable Storage Test Criteria' FROM CS_CpuTestCriteria AS Cpu, CS_MemTestCriteria AS Mem, CS_NetTestCriteria AS Net, CS_StorTestCriteria AS Stor"}]}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Invalid Input", "explanation": "Iterator configuration is invalid.", "report_group": "SUMMARY", "report_verdict": {"apply_test_verdict": true, "failed_verdict_explanation": "Maximum Instance Count (MaxInstanceCount) must be greater than or equal to the Minimum Instance Count (MinInstanceCount).", "passed_verdict_explanation": "Should never get here.", "sql_for_verdict": [{"static": "SELECT 0"}], "db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT MinVal AS 'Minimum Instance Count', MaxVal AS 'Maximum Instance Count' FROM CS_IteratorConfig"}]}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"sql_operations": [{"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_NodesPerModel (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, CloudTemplateModelHnd, NodesPerModel)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_ReservedInstances (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, CloudTemplateModelHnd, ReservedInstances)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT TM.Handle AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, COUNT(DISTINCT CTN.Handle) AS NodesPerModel FROM CloudTemplateModel AS TM, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='ParentChild' AND CTN.ParentHnd = TM.Handle GROUP BY TM.Handle"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_NodesPerModel", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["CloudTemplateModelHnd", "NodesPerModel"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT TM.Handle AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, COUNT(*) AS ReservedInstances FROM CloudTemplateModel AS TM, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedCloudStressSession' AND CTI.Handle = RT.SourceHnd AND CTI.ParentHnd = TM.Handle GROUP BY TM.Handle"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_ReservedInstances", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["CloudTemplateModelHnd", "ReservedInstances"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Handle, Name FROM CloudTemplateModel"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CloudTemplateModel", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Handle", "Name"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Create Configuration Summary

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(Res.ErrModels) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN Conf.MaxInstanceCount > ResInst.ReservedInstances THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS ErrModels FROM CS_ReservedInstances AS ResInst, CS_TestConfiguration AS Conf) AS Res"}]}, "sql_operations": []}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Model Reserved Instance Count at least MaxInstanceCount

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Invalid Input", "explanation": "All template models provide at least the max number of instances (Maximum Instance Count).", "report_group": "SUMMARY", "report_verdict": {"apply_test_verdict": true, "failed_verdict_explanation": "The fixed load methodology requires that all templates provide at least the maximum number of instances as configured by Maximum Instance Count.", "passed_verdict_explanation": "Should never get here.", "sql_for_verdict": [{"static": "SELECT 0"}], "db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CTM.Name AS 'Template', ResInst.ReservedInstances AS 'Reserved Instances', (SELECT MaxInstanceCount FROM CS_TestConfiguration) AS 'Max Instance Count' FROM CS_ReservedInstances AS ResInst, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM WHERE CTM.Handle=ResInst.CloudTemplateModelHnd"}]}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN EnableCpuLoad='1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM CS_EnableTestLoad"}]}, "sql_operations": []}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify CPU Load

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT Map.CpuProfileName FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CpuLoadConfig AS LoadConf WHERE CTN.Handle=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND LoadConf.LoadProfileName=Map.CpuProfileName AND LoadConf.NodeId=CTN.ResId AND CTN.CpuCores * 100 < LoadConf.CpuLoad)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END"}]}, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT ID, CpuLoad, TemplateId, NodeId, MachineGroupIndex, MachineIndex, NodeName, LoadProfileName FROM CpuLoadConfig"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CpuLoadConfig", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["ID", "CpuLoad", "TemplateId", "NodeId", "MachineGroupIndex", "MachineIndex", "NodeName", "LoadProfileName"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify CPU Load Requirements

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "CPU Load Exceeds Maximum Configurable Load", "explanation": "Configured CPU load is greater than the amount of load that can be generated (100% * number of CPU cores).", "report_group": "SUMMARY", "report_verdict": {"apply_test_verdict": true, "failed_verdict_explanation": "Configured CPU load is greater than the amount of load that can be generated (100% * number of CPU cores).", "passed_verdict_explanation": "Should never get here.", "sql_for_verdict": [{"static": "SELECT 0"}], "db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, "db_information": {"db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Map.ModelName AS 'Template', Map.NodeName AS 'Node', Map.CpuProfileName AS 'Load Profile', CTN.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', LoadConf.CpuLoad AS 'CPU Load', CTN.CpuCores * 100 AS 'Maximum Configurable Load' FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CpuLoadConfig AS LoadConf WHERE CTN.Handle=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND LoadConf.LoadProfileName=Map.CpuProfileName AND LoadConf.NodeId=CTN.ResId AND CTN.CpuCores * 100 < LoadConf.CpuLoad"}]}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Storage I/O Settings

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(DiskCheck.IsErr) AS ErrRows FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CTN.DiskName LIKE '%vblk0.3%' OR CTN.DiskName LIKE '%vblk1%' THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN (CTN.DiskName LIKE 'vblk%' AND (Conf.ReadRate != 0 OR Conf.WriteRate != 0)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS IsErr FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, StorageLoadConfig AS Conf WHERE CTN.ResId=Map.NodeResId AND Conf.ID=Map.ProfileId) AS DiskCheck) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END"}]}, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT ID, ReadRate, WriteRate, ReadSize, WriteSize, TargetDevice, EnableFileSize, FileSize, AccessPattern, QueueDepth, TemplateId, NodeId, MachineGroupIndex, MachineIndex, NodeName, LoadProfileName FROM StorageLoadConfig"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "StorageLoadConfig", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["ID", "ReadRate", "WriteRate", "ReadSize", "WriteSize", "TargetDevice", "EnableFileSize", "FileSize", "AccessPattern", "QueueDepth", "TemplateId", "NodeId", "MachineGroupIndex", "MachineIndex", "NodeName", "LoadProfileName"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Storage I/O Disk Requirements

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Storage I/O Disk Requirement Not Met", "explanation": "Agents do not meet Storage I/O disk requirements.", "report_group": "SUMMARY", "report_verdict": {"apply_test_verdict": true, "failed_verdict_explanation": "Cannot find usable test disk or partition on agents.", "passed_verdict_explanation": "Should never get here.", "sql_for_verdict": [{"static": "SELECT 0"}], "db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, "db_information": {"db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CTN.Name AS Name, CTN.DiskName AS 'Disk Name', CTN.DiskSize AS 'Disk Size' FROM RelationTable AS Rel, Tag AS Tag, CloudTemplateNode as CTN WHERE Type='UserTag' AND Tag.Handle == Rel.TargetHnd AND Tag.Name='ttCloudTemplateNode' AND CTN.Handle=Rel.SourceHnd AND CTN.DiskName NOT LIKE '%vblk0.3%' AND CTN.DiskName NOT LIKE '%vblk1%'"}]}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(DiskCheck.IsErr) AS ErrRows FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CTN.HypervisorType NOT LIKE 'NONE' THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN (Conf.TargetDevice NOT LIKE '%/%' AND (Conf.ReadRate != 0 OR Conf.WriteRate != 0)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS IsErr FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, StorageLoadConfig AS Conf WHERE CTN.ResId=Map.NodeResId AND Conf.ID=Map.ProfileId) AS DiskCheck) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END"}]}, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT ID, ReadRate, WriteRate, ReadSize, WriteSize, TargetDevice, EnableFileSize, FileSize, AccessPattern, QueueDepth, TemplateId, NodeId, MachineGroupIndex, MachineIndex, NodeName, LoadProfileName FROM StorageLoadConfig"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "StorageLoadConfig", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["ID", "ReadRate", "WriteRate", "ReadSize", "WriteSize", "TargetDevice", "EnableFileSize", "FileSize", "AccessPattern", "QueueDepth", "TemplateId", "NodeId", "MachineGroupIndex", "MachineIndex", "NodeName", "LoadProfileName"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Storage I/O Disk Requirements for user space binary

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Storage I/O Disk Requirement Not Met", "explanation": "Agents do not meet Storage I/O disk requirements.", "report_group": "SUMMARY", "report_verdict": {"apply_test_verdict": true, "failed_verdict_explanation": "Storage target device must be a file path (e.g. /tmp/) when agent is run as a user space daemon.", "passed_verdict_explanation": "Should never get here.", "sql_for_verdict": [{"static": "SELECT 0"}], "db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, "db_information": {"db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT DISTINCT CTN.Name AS Name, CTN.HypervisorType AS 'Hypervisor Type', CTN.DiskName AS 'Disk Name', CTN.DiskSize AS 'Disk Size', Conf.TargetDevice AS 'Target Device' FROM RelationTable AS Rel, Tag AS Tag, CloudTemplateNode as CTN, StorageLoadConfig as Conf, CS_ProfileMap as Map WHERE Type='UserTag' AND Tag.Handle == Rel.TargetHnd AND Tag.Name='ttCloudTemplateNode' AND CTN.Handle=Rel.SourceHnd AND CTN.HypervisorType LIKE 'NONE' AND Conf.TargetDevice NOT LIKE '%/%' AND Map.ProfileId=Conf.ID"}]}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Generate the error description and fail the test)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT SUM(DiskCheck.IsErr) AS ErrRows FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CTN.HypervisorType LIKE 'NONE' THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN (Conf.TargetDevice LIKE '%/%' AND (Conf.ReadRate != 0 OR Conf.WriteRate != 0)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS IsErr FROM CS_ProfileMap AS Map, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, StorageLoadConfig AS Conf WHERE CTN.ResId=Map.NodeResId AND Conf.ID=Map.ProfileId) AS DiskCheck) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END"}]}, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT ID, ReadRate, WriteRate, ReadSize, WriteSize, TargetDevice, EnableFileSize, FileSize, AccessPattern, QueueDepth, TemplateId, NodeId, MachineGroupIndex, MachineIndex, NodeName, LoadProfileName FROM StorageLoadConfig"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "StorageLoadConfig", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["ID", "ReadRate", "WriteRate", "ReadSize", "WriteSize", "TargetDevice", "EnableFileSize", "FileSize", "AccessPattern", "QueueDepth", "TemplateId", "NodeId", "MachineGroupIndex", "MachineIndex", "NodeName", "LoadProfileName"]}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Received Agent CPU Load Results (table rows per template)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT 'CPU' AS Dimension, 'Load Variance' AS Measurement, ResTable.Template AS Template, ResTable.NodeCount AS NodeCount, ResTable.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstanceCount, ResTable.AgentCount AS AgentCount, ResTable.ExpAgentResCount AS ExpectedAgentResultsCount, ResTable.ActAgentResCount AS ActualAgentResultsCount FROM (SELECT Map.MachineSetName AS Template, MII.NodesPerModel AS NodeCount, MII.ReservedInstances AS ReservedInstances, MII.AgentCount AS AgentCount, MIN(5, (CAST((SELECT CurrVal FROM CS_IteratorState) AS INTEGER) * MII.NodesPerModel)) AS ExpAgentResCount, COUNT(Res.InstanceHnd) AS ActAgentResCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS MII, CS_MachineSetInstanceMap AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=MII.CloudTemplateModelHnd GROUP BY CTI.ParentHnd) AS ResTable WHERE ResTable.ExpAgentResCount != ResTable.ActAgentResCount"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_ResErrMissingThresholdResults", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Dimension", "Measurement", "Template", "NodeCount", "ReservedInstanceCount", "AgentCount", "ExpectedAgentResultsCount", "ActualAgentResultsCount"]}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(ErrCount) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN (Res.True + Res.False) >=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ErrCount FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR WHERE TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) <1)"}]}, "sql_operations": []}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Run SQL: Verify Received Agent CPU Load Results (at least one measurement reported)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT 'CPU' AS Dimension, 'Load Variance' AS Measurement, Map.MachineSetName AS Template, TR.AgentHostname AS Agent FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS Res, ThresholdResults AS TR, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CS_MachineSetInstanceMap AS Map WHERE CTI.Handle=Res.InstanceHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND TR.Handle=Res.ThresholdResultsHnd AND (Res.True + Res.False) < 1"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_ResErrZeroThresholdChecks", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Dimension", "Measurement", "Template", "Agent"]}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: RunSql (Update error table)

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarResults (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, CurrVal, CpuLoad, AgentHostname, AgentPort, True, False, TotalMeasurements, FailureRate, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict, ThresholdResultsHnd, CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CloudTemplateModelHnd, CloudTemplateNodeHnd, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT LoadIter.IterationNum AS Iteration, LoadIter.IteratorCurrVal AS CurrVal, TR.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, TR.AgentPort AS AgentPort, LoadIter.True AS True, LoadIter.False AS False, LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False AS TotalMeasurements, LoadIter.FailureRate AS FailureRate, ROUND((100.0 - LoadIter.FailureRate), 2) AS SuccessRate, ABS(TRC.Threshold) * 100.0 AS AcceptableVariance, TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN LoadIter.False/(LoadIter.True + LoadIter.False) * 100.0 >= TestCriteria.CpuLoadVarianceSuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict, LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd AS ThresholdResultsHnd, LoadIter.InstanceHnd AS CloudTemplateInstanceHnd, CTI.ParentHnd AS CloudTemplateModelHnd, TR.CloudTemplateNode AS CloudTemplateNodeHnd, JT.LpHnd AS CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd, JT.ClpgHnd AS CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd FROM CS_CpuLoadVar AS LoadIter, ThresholdResults AS TR, ThresholdResultConfig AS TRC, CS_TestCriteria AS TestCriteria, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, (SELECT CTN.Handle AS CtnHnd, LP.Handle AS LpHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd, CTM.Handle AS CtmHnd FROM CloudTemplateNode AS CTN, CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfile AS LP, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG, CloudTemplateModel AS CTM, RelationTable AS RT WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedNodeLoadProfile' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTN.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=LP.Handle AND LP.ParentHnd=CLPG.Handle AND CTM.Handle=CLPG.ParentHnd) AS JT, (SELECT CTI.Handle AS CtiHnd, CLPG.Handle AS ClpgHnd FROM RelationTable AS RT, CloudTemplateInstance AS CTI, CloudLoadProfileGroup AS CLPG WHERE RT.Type='AffiliatedInstanceLoadProfileGroup' AND RT.SourceHnd=CTI.Handle AND RT.TargetHnd=CLPG.Handle) AS InstLoadProfMap WHERE TR.ParentHnd=TRC.Handle AND LoadIter.ThresholdResultsHnd=TR.Handle AND CTI.Handle=LoadIter.InstanceHnd AND TR.CloudTemplateNode=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtnHnd=CTN.Handle AND JT.CtmHnd=CTI.ParentHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.ClpgHnd=JT.ClpgHnd AND InstLoadProfMap.CtiHnd=CTI.Handle"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_CpuLoadVarResults", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "CurrVal", "AgentHostname", "AgentPort", "True", "False", "TotalMeasurements", "FailureRate", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "Verdict", "ThresholdResultsHnd", "CloudTemplateInstanceHnd", "CloudTemplateModelHnd", "CloudTemplateNodeHnd", "CloudTimeVaryingLoadProfileHnd", "CloudLoadProfileGroupHnd"]}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CS_CpuLoadVarSum (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, Iteration, InstanceCount, TotalMeasurements, FailedMeasurements, SuccessRate, AcceptableVariance, SuccessThreshold, Verdict)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) AS TotalMeasurements, SUM(Res.True) AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0), 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, CASE WHEN (SUM(Res.False) / SUM(Res.TotalMeasurements) * 100.0) >= Res.SuccessThreshold THEN 'PASS' ELSE 'FAIL' END AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res GROUP BY Res.Iteration"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_CpuLoadVarSum", "dest_db_name": "LAST_ITERATION"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "InstanceCount", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "Verdict"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Sum.Iteration AS Iteration, Sum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, SUM(MIN(5, Model.NodesPerModel * Sum.InstanceCount)) AS TotalAgentsChecked, Sum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, Sum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, Sum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, Sum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Sum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, Sum.Verdict AS Verdict FROM CS_CpuLoadVarSum AS Sum, CS_ModelInstanceInfo AS Model"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentSummary", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "InstanceCount", "TotalAgentsChecked", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "Verdict"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT AgentSum.Iteration AS Iteration, AgentSum.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, AgentSum.TotalAgentsChecked AS TotalAgentsChecked, AgentSum.TotalMeasurements AS TotalMeasurements, AgentSum.FailedMeasurements AS FailedMeasurements, AgentSum.SuccessRate AS SuccessRate, AgentSum.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, AgentSum.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold, AgentSum.Verdict AS IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentSummary AS AgentSum WHERE AgentSum.Iteration = (SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState)"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuLoadVarRealTimeResults", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Iteration", "InstanceCount", "TotalAgentsChecked", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold", "IterVerdict"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Res.Iteration AS Iteration, Res.AgentHostname AS AgentHostname, Map.ModelDispName AS ModelName, Map.NodeName AS NodeName, Map.CpuProfileName AS ProfileName, ROUND(TD.AvgVal * 100.0, 2) AS ActualAvgCpuLoad, Res.True + Res.False AS TotalMeasurements, Res.True AS FailedMeasurements, ROUND((Res.False / (Res.True + Res.False)) * 100.0, 2) AS SuccessRate, Res.AcceptableVariance AS AcceptableVariance, Res.SuccessThreshold AS SuccessThreshold FROM CS_CpuLoadVarResults AS Res, Tdigest_AgentCpuSummStats AS TD, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE TD.AgentHostname=Res.AgentHostname AND TD.Statistic='CPU_UTILIZATION' AND Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Res.CloudTemplateNodeHnd AND Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Res.CloudTemplateModelHnd"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_IterCpuLoadVarAgentRealTimeResults", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "LAST_ITERATION", "columns": ["Iteration", "AgentHostname", "ModelName", "NodeName", "ProfileName", "ActualAvgCpuLoad", "TotalMeasurements", "FailedMeasurements", "SuccessRate", "AcceptableVariance", "SuccessThreshold"]}}, {"enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "UPDATE CS_VerdictSummary SET CpuVerdict=(SELECT Res.IterVerdict FROM CS_IterCpuLoadVarRealTimeResults AS Res, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Res.Iteration=Iter.Iteration) WHERE Iteration=(SELECT Iter.Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Network Read Rate (ops/second) Variance Distribution Per Node", "explanation": "Observed Network Read Rate (ops/second) variance distribution across all agents per node per percentile.", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Template", "Node", "Mean", "Minimum", "Maximum", "P1", "P5", "P10", "P20", "P30", "P40", "P50", "P60", "P70", "P80", "P90", "P95", "P99", "P99.5", "P99.9", "P99.95", "P99.99"]}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Map.ModelDispName AS Template, Map.NodeName as Node, ROUND(TdRes.AvgVal, 2) AS 'Mean', ROUND(TdRes.MinVal, 2) AS 'Minimum', ROUND(MaxVal, 2) AS 'Maximum', ROUND(TdRes.Per1, 2) AS 'P1', ROUND(TdRes.Per5, 2) AS 'P5', ROUND(TdRes.Per10, 2) AS 'P10', ROUND(TdRes.Per20, 2) AS 'P20', ROUND(TdRes.Per30, 2) AS 'P30', ROUND(TdRes.Per40, 2) AS 'P40', ROUND(TdRes.Per50, 2) AS 'P50', ROUND(TdRes.Per60, 2) AS 'P60', ROUND(TdRes.Per70, 2) AS 'P70', ROUND(TdRes.Per80, 2) AS 'P80', ROUND(TdRes.Per90, 2) AS 'P90', ROUND(TdRes.Per95, 2) AS 'P95', ROUND(TdRes.Per99, 2) AS 'P99', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_5, 2) AS 'P99.5', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_9, 2) AS 'P99.9', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_95, 2) AS 'P99.95', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_99, 2) AS 'P99.99' FROM CS_IterNetReadVarTdigestSumResults AS TdRes, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND TdRes.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND TdRes.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd"}]}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Report Network Read Variance Distribution

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"enable": true, "report": {"display_name": "Storage Read Rate (ops/second) Variance Distribution Per Node", "explanation": "Observed Storage Read Rate (ops/second) variance distribution across all agents per node per percentile.", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Template", "Node", "Mean", "Minimum", "Maximum", "P1", "P5", "P10", "P20", "P30", "P40", "P50", "P60", "P70", "P80", "P90", "P95", "P99", "P99.5", "P99.9", "P99.95", "P99.99"]}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Map.ModelDispName AS Template, Map.NodeName as Node, ROUND(TdRes.AvgVal, 2) AS 'Mean', ROUND(TdRes.MinVal, 2) AS 'Minimum', ROUND(MaxVal, 2) AS 'Maximum', ROUND(TdRes.Per1, 2) AS 'P1', ROUND(TdRes.Per5, 2) AS 'P5', ROUND(TdRes.Per10, 2) AS 'P10', ROUND(TdRes.Per20, 2) AS 'P20', ROUND(TdRes.Per30, 2) AS 'P30', ROUND(TdRes.Per40, 2) AS 'P40', ROUND(TdRes.Per50, 2) AS 'P50', ROUND(TdRes.Per60, 2) AS 'P60', ROUND(TdRes.Per70, 2) AS 'P70', ROUND(TdRes.Per80, 2) AS 'P80', ROUND(TdRes.Per90, 2) AS 'P90', ROUND(TdRes.Per95, 2) AS 'P95', ROUND(TdRes.Per99, 2) AS 'P99', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_5, 2) AS 'P99.5', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_9, 2) AS 'P99.9', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_95, 2) AS 'P99.95', ROUND(TdRes.Per99_99, 2) AS 'P99.99' FROM CS_IterStorReadVarTdigestSumResults AS TdRes, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE IterationNum=(SELECT Iteration FROM CS_IteratorState) AND TdRes.CloudTemplateModelHnd=Map.CloudTemplateModelHnd AND TdRes.CloudTemplateNodeHnd=Map.CloudTemplateNodeHnd"}]}]}

'End Iteration' AS EventDescription, ('End Iteration (' || Iter.CurrVal || ' Instances)') AS EventTextShort, ('End Iteration (' || Iter.CurrVal || ' Instances)') AS EventText, Iter.Iteration AS Iteration, Iter.CurrVal AS CurrVal, Iter.CurrVal AS InstanceCount, strftime('%s','now') AS BllTimestamp, Criteria.CpuLoadAcceptableVariance AS CpuLoadAcceptableVariance, Criteria.MemReadRateAcceptableVariance AS MemReadRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.MemReadRateAcceptableLatency AS MemReadRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance AS MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.NetReadRateAcceptableVariance AS NetReadRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.NetReadRateAcceptableLatency AS NetReadRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance AS NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.StorReadRateAcceptableVariance AS StorReadRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.StorReadRateAcceptableLatency AS StorReadRateAcceptableLatency, Criteria.StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance AS StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance, Criteria.StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency FROM CS_IteratorState AS Iter, CS_TestCriteria AS Criteria, CS_SecurityToken AS Token"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "CS_Events", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["SessionId", "Event", "EventDescription", "EventTextShort", "EventText", "Iteration", "CurrVal", "InstanceCount", "BllTimestamp", "CpuLoadAcceptableVariance", "MemReadRateAcceptableVariance", "NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency", "StorReadRateAcceptableVariance", "StorReadRateAcceptableLatency", "StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance", "StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency"]}}]}

spirent.methodology.ProcessDataCommand.InputJson: {"enable": true, "operation_list": [{"add_to_influx_db": {"enable": true, "src": {"sql": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Events.SessionId AS SessionId, Events.Event AS Event, Events.EventDescription AS EventDescription, Events.EventTextShort AS EventTextShort, Events.EventText AS EventText, Events.Iteration AS Iteration, Events.CurrVal AS CurrVal, Events.InstanceCount AS InstanceCount, Events.BllTimestamp AS BllTimestamp, CAST(Events.CpuLoadAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS CpuLoadAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS MemReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS MemReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.MemWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS MemWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS MemWriteRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.NetReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS NetReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.NetReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS NetReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.NetWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS NetWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS NetWriteRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.StorReadRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS StorReadRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.StorReadRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS StorReadRateAcceptableLatency, CAST(Events.StorWriteRateAcceptableVariance * 10000 AS INTEGER) AS StorWriteRateAcceptableVarianceInt, CAST(Events.StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency AS FLOAT) AS StorWriteRateAcceptableLatency FROM CS_Events AS Events, CS_IteratorState AS Iter WHERE Events.Iteration=Iter.Iteration AND Events.Event='end_iteration'"}]}}, "dst": [{"influx_db_add": {"db": "metrics", "include_session_token": false, "measurement": "CS_TVLP_CAPACITY_cs_bll_events", "tag_field_list": ["SessionId", "Event", "Iteration", "CurrVal", "CpuLoadAcceptableVarianceInt", spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"sql_operations": [{"report": {"explanation": "Summary of methodology input values.", "display_name": "Test Configuration Summary", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT (SELECT SUM(ReservedInstances) FROM CS_ReservedInstances) AS 'Total Instance Count', (SELECT SUM(CS_NodesPerModel.NodesPerModel * CS_ReservedInstances.ReservedInstances) FROM CS_NodesPerModel JOIN CS_ReservedInstances ON CS_NodesPerModel.CloudTemplateModelHnd = CS_ReservedInstances.CloudTemplateModelHnd) AS 'Total Agent Count', Conf.Duration AS 'Iteration Duration (sec)', Conf.InitialInstanceCount AS 'Initial Instance Count (per template)', Conf.MinInstanceCount AS 'Minimum Instance Count (per template)', Conf.MaxInstanceCount AS 'Maximum Instance Count (per template)', Conf.SearchResolution AS 'Search Resolution (instances)', Crit.EnableCpuTestCriteria AS 'Enable CPU Test Criteria', Crit.EnableMemTestCriteria AS 'Enable Memory Test Criteria', Crit.EnableNetTestCriteria AS 'Enable Network Test Criteria', Crit.EnableStorTestCriteria AS 'Enable Storage Test Criteria' FROM CS_TestConfiguration AS Conf, CS_TestCriteria AS Crit"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Report Configuration Summary

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"sql_operations": [{"report": {"explanation": "Summary of the Time-Varying Load Profile Configuration.", "display_name": "CPU Load Configuration", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Conf.LoadProfileName AS 'Load Profile', CASE WHEN Map.ModelResId='' THEN '---' ELSE Map.ModelDispName END AS 'Template', CASE WHEN Conf.NodeId='' THEN '---' ELSE Conf.NodeName END AS 'Node' FROM TvlpLoadConfig AS Conf, CS_ProfileMap AS Map WHERE Conf.ID = Map.ProfileId"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Create Time-Varying Load Profile Configuration Summary

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "command_return_value": {"enable": true, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT CASE WHEN EnableMemTestCriteria='False' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END FROM CS_TestCriteria"}]}, "sql_operations": []}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"report": {"explanation": "Summarization of the Memory I/O iteration test results.", "display_name": "Memory I/O Summary", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT MemReadVar.Iteration AS Iteration, MemReadVar.InstanceCount AS 'Instance Count (per template)', MemReadVar.IterVerdict AS 'Read Variance Verdict', MemReadLat.IterVerdict 'Read Latency Verdict', MemWriteVar.IterVerdict AS 'Write Variance Verdict', MemWriteLat.IterVerdict AS 'Write Latency Verdict', CASE WHEN MemReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR MemReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR MemWriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR MemWriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Overall Verdict' FROM CS_IterMemReadVarRealTimeResults AS MemReadVar, CS_IterMemReadLatRealTimeResults AS MemReadLat, CS_IterMemWriteVarRealTimeResults AS MemWriteVar, CS_IterMemWriteLatRealTimeResults AS MemWriteLat WHERE MemReadVar.Iteration=MemReadLat.Iteration AND MemReadVar.Iteration=MemWriteVar.Iteration AND MemReadVar.Iteration=MemWriteLat.Iteration"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Iteration", "Instance Count", "Read Variance Verdict", "Read Latency Verdict", "Write Variance Verdict", "Write Latency Verdict", "Overall Verdict"]}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"enable": true, "sql_operations": [{"report": {"explanation": "Summarization of the Network I/O iteration test results.", "display_name": "Network I/O Summary", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "enable": true, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT NetReadVar.Iteration AS Iteration, NetReadVar.InstanceCount AS 'Instance Count (per template)', NetReadVar.IterVerdict AS 'Read Variance Verdict', NetReadLat.IterVerdict 'Read Latency Verdict', NetWriteVar.IterVerdict AS 'Write Variance Verdict', NetWriteLat.IterVerdict AS 'Write Latency Verdict', CASE WHEN NetReadVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR NetReadLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR NetWriteVar.IterVerdict='FAIL' OR NetWriteLat.IterVerdict='FAIL' THEN 'FAIL' ELSE 'PASS' END AS 'Overall Verdict' FROM CS_IterNetReadVarRealTimeResults AS NetReadVar, CS_IterNetReadLatRealTimeResults AS NetReadLat, CS_IterNetWriteVarRealTimeResults AS NetWriteVar, CS_IterNetWriteLatRealTimeResults AS NetWriteLat WHERE NetReadVar.Iteration=NetReadLat.Iteration AND NetReadVar.Iteration=NetWriteVar.Iteration AND NetReadVar.Iteration=NetWriteLat.Iteration"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["Iteration", "Instance Count", "Read Variance Verdict", "Read Latency Verdict", "Write Variance Verdict", "Write Latency Verdict", "Overall Verdict"]}}]}

spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.DbJsonString: {"sql_operations": [{"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_Start (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS VM_Snapshot_End (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FlavorId STRING, FlavorName, Count INTEGER, CpuCores INTEGER, MemoryMb INTEGER, DiskInfo)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_start_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_start_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "VM_Snapshot_Start", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["FlavorId", "FlavorName", "Count", "CpuCores", "MemoryMb", "DiskInfo"]}}, {"sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorId, Info.FlavorName, Info.Count, Info.CpuCores, Info.MemoryMb, GROUP_CONCAT(PRINTF('%s: %s %s', DiskInfo.Name, DiskInfo.Size, DiskInfo.SizeUnit), ', ') AS 'DiskInfo' FROM vm_snapshot_end_info AS Info, vm_snapshot_end_disk_info AS DiskInfo WHERE Info.FlavorId=DiskInfo.FlavorId GROUP BY Info.FlavorName ORDER BY Info.FlavorName, DiskInfo.DiskIndex"}], "db_information": {"dest_db": {"dest_table_name": "VM_Snapshot_End", "dest_db_name": "SUMMARY"}, "db_name": "SUMMARY", "columns": ["FlavorId", "FlavorName", "Count", "CpuCores", "MemoryMb", "DiskInfo"]}}, {"report": {"explanation": "Summary of VM Snapshot information.", "display_name": "Running VMs Not Included in Test", "report_group": "SUMMARY"}, "sql_statement": [{"static": "SELECT Start.FlavorName AS 'Name', Start.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Start.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Start.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Start.Count AS 'Start Count', (End.Count - Start.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Start, VM_Snapshot_End AS End WHERE Start.FlavorId=End.FlavorId"}, {"static": "UNION"}, {"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', Info.Count AS 'Start Count', PRINTF('-%d', Info.Count) AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_Start AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_End)"}, {"static": "UNION"}, {"static": "SELECT Info.FlavorName AS 'Name', Info.CpuCores AS 'CPU Cores', Info.MemoryMb AS 'Memory (MB)', Info.DiskInfo AS 'Disk Information', 0 AS 'Start Count', Info.Count AS 'Delta' FROM VM_Snapshot_End AS Info WHERE Info.FlavorId NOT IN (SELECT FlavorId FROM VM_Snapshot_Start)"}], "db_information": {"db_name": "SUMMARY"}}]}
spirent.methodology.RunSqlCommand.Name: Create VM Snapshot Summary
